Template to input location data to the R: Each data sheet has colored columns with the variables we need.
The table below indicates which sheet should be prefered in different scenarios.
If you are looking for a country (ADM0)
If you are looking for a second order administrative region (ADM1)
If you are looking for the lowest administrative region possible (ADM2)
If you are looking for a protected area
If you are looking for an island
Unnamed: 1:
1) geoboundaries_country if it is a country.
2) geoboundaries_stateProvince if it can be a lower admin region.
3) geoboundaries_county if it is an even smaller region.
4) global_islands if none of the above had the information.

Template to input location data to the R: If you didn't find what you were looking for
Unnamed: 1: Send an email with the name of the locality and a picture/screenshot of an acompanying map (if available) to ortega_solis@fzp.czu.cz
Send an email explaining the error to ortega_solis@fzp.czu.cz
